column3: Description
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]Bad draw. No synergy.[]|
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]Ooh. Maybe this will[]|get interesting.
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]Do you have mox?|[gray]Doesn't matter. Play me.[]
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]You look like you're[]|[gray]about to lose.[]
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]You're dead. Definitely.[]|[gray]Yep.[]
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]Doesn't look good.|[gray]Maybe I can change that.
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]That Lady Luck...[]|[gray]Ugh. Forget it. Attack.[]
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]Don't go too fast.[]|[gray]You need time to think.[]
[moxred]: Do [sword]<d6> damage|Else: Do [sword]<d6>-2 damage|[gray]Remember to use[]|[gray]your limit break.[]
